[CLS] that afternoon , the american evacuees were flown to frankfurt , germany , from where they continued home . [SEP] the 2010 claxton shield was the 57th claxton shield tournament , the premier baseball competition in australia , and was held from 6 november 2009 to 7 february 2010 . [SEP]
[CLS] it was hailed as the precursor to the new australian baseball league that will start in the place of the claxton shield in late 2010 to early 2011 . [SEP] the victoria aces defeated south australia two games to nil in the championship series to win the tournament ; this was the 22nd time the claxton shield had been awarded to a victorian team . [SEP]
[CLS] the competition was sponsored by domino ' s pizza . [SEP] at the conclusion of the regular season , the victoria aces finished in first place with a 17 – 7 record , earning home @ - @ field advantage for the three @ - @ game championship series . [SEP]
[CLS] south australia hosted the three @ - @ game semi @ - @ final series against the new south wales patriots . [SEP] both teams finished with a 14 – 10 record . [SEP]
[CLS] the perth heat ( 12 – 12 ) and queensland rams ( 3 – 21 ) both failed to qualify for the finals . [SEP] in june 2009 , it was announced that the rights to the claxton shield had been sold to a new australian baseball league ( abl ) , with ownership split between major league baseball ' s 75 percent share and the 25 percent share owned by the australian baseball federation . [SEP]
[CLS] the 2010 tournament was considered preparation for the inaugural abl season starting in 2010 – 11 . [SEP] it varied from the 2009 claxton shield by expanding the season to include ten rounds . [SEP]
[CLS] since an uneven number ( five ) teams were involved , four teams paired off for each round and played a three @ - @ game series , while the remaining team took a bye . [SEP] during the season , each team had two bye rounds and played two rounds against each other team , one at home and one away . [SEP]
[CLS] in total , the schedule allowed for 24 regular @ - @ season games per team before a postseason similar to the 2009 edition : the first @ - @ place team directly qualified for the championship series and played against the winner of a playoff series between the second - and third @ - @ place teams . [SEP] during the regular season , games were played on a friday night and a doubleheader on saturday ; in each doubleheader one of the two games was shortened to seven innings . [SEP]
[CLS] the exception to this was when perth played their home games ; they played on a thursday night instead of a doubleheader on saturday . [SEP] each postseason series was scheduled for a friday , saturday and sunday . [SEP]
[CLS] the 2010 series allowed each team to make use of a 19 @ - @ man active roster . [SEP] exceptions were made in two cases that allowed teams ' active rosters to expand to 21 players , both times for the same reason . [SEP]
[CLS] two games during the season had to be postponed because of poor weather . [SEP] both games involved teams meeting for the first time during the season ; make @ - @ up games were scheduled at the start of the return series between the teams , and this resulted in two four @ - @ game series . [SEP]
[CLS] in both cases , the teams had a 19 @ - @ man roster for the make @ - @ up game , and an expanded 21 @ - @ man roster for the originally scheduled series . [SEP] the 2010 claxton shield was contested between five teams from around australia . [SEP]
[CLS] in previous years , many of the teams had played their home games at multiple venues . [SEP] this season each team held their home games at only one venue . [SEP]
[CLS] there was one scheduled exception to this at the start of the season : the new south wales patriots ' final home series against the perth heat was held at gilchrist oval , whereas all of their other home games were held at blacktown baseball stadium . [SEP] as a result of poor attendance at geelong baseball park , game one of the fifth @ - @ round series between new south wales and the victoria aces was moved to la trobe university , melbourne . [SEP]
[CLS] although the geelong games had attracted crowds of no more than 500 , the moved game had an attendance of 2 @ , @ 200 . [SEP] though no further regular season games were moved , the finals series hosted by the aces was held at la trobe university as well . [SEP]
[CLS] the venues are as follows : † — a game postponed from round 7 , held in round 8 , was played with victoria aces as the away team and queensland rams as the home team , despite being played at geelong baseball park , geelong , victoria . [SEP] ‡ — a game postponed from round 3 , held in round 9 , was played with south australia as the away team and victoria aces as the home team , despite being played at norwood oval , adelaide , south australia . [CLS] the queensland rams were the first team to be eliminated from contention for the finals , after being swept four games to nil by the victoria aces in round 8 . [SEP] the following round saw south australia clinch a position in the finals , despite finishing the round in second position . [SEP]
[CLS] it was not until the final round that the last two spots in the finals were decided : the aces clinched top spot by sweeping the perth heat , which combined with the new south wales patriots sweep of the rams eliminated perth from contention and secured the last finals spot for the patriots . [SEP] the 2010 claxton shield made use of the same finals structure as had been used in the 2009 season . [SEP]
[CLS] the top three teams at the conclusion of the ten rounds of regular @ - @ season games qualified . [SEP] the second - and third @ - @ place teams faced in each other in a best @ - @ of @ - @ three series hosted by the second @ - @ place team . [SEP]
[CLS] the winner of that series then faced the first @ - @ place team for a best @ - @ of @ - @ three series . [SEP] south australia hosted the new south wales patriots at norwood oval , adelaide , while the victoria aces hosted the championship series at la trobe university , melbourne . [SEP]
[CLS] in the finals , the home team and away team alternated during each of the series . [SEP] as a result , south australia was officially the away team for game two of its series against new south wales , as was victoria in the championship series . [SEP]
[CLS] after defeating the patriots two games to one in the semi @ - @ final series , south australia progressed to the championship series against the aces . [SEP] there they were defeated two games to nil . [SEP]
[CLS] after game two of the championship series , victoria ' s matthew blackmore was named both claxton shield final series mvp and pitcher of the year . [SEP] at the conclusion of the finals series , the winner of two awards were announced . [SEP]
[CLS] matthew blackmore won both the pitcher of the year award and the finals series mvp award . [SEP] at the baseball australia diamond awards , held on 6 march at the hotel grand chancellor , adelaide , wayne lundgren was announced as the 35th winner of the helms award ; the claxton shield ' s most valuable player award . [SEP]
[CLS] lundgren was the first pitcher to win since 1986 . [SEP] runners @ - @ up by two votes were paul mildren and michael collins . [SEP]
[CLS] independiente is the thirteenth spanish @ - @ language studio album by guatemalan singer @ - @ songwriter ricardo arjona , released on 23 september 2011 . [SEP] recorded in the united states and mexico , it was produced by arjona with dan warner , lee levin and puerto rican singer @ - @ songwriter tommy torres . [SEP]
[CLS] the album — the first independent release by arjona after he was signed by sony music in 1993 and warner music in 2008 — was issued by his own label , metamorfosis . [SEP] composed and written in a year , the record marks arjona and torres ' fourth collaboration . [SEP]
[CLS] for independiente , arjona returns to his trademark sound after his stylistic departure for poquita ropa ( 2010 ) . [SEP] while producing the latter , he had used fewer instruments to simplify his sound , having introduced what had been called a " stripped @ - @ down acoustic effort " in his music . [SEP]
[CLS] independiente has been compared to his earlier recordings , historias ( 1994 ) and animal nocturno ( 1993 ) . [SEP] independiente became arjona ' s fourth number @ - @ one album on the billboard top latin albums where it debuted for the week ending 22 october 2011 . [SEP]
[CLS] for thirteen non @ - @ consecutive weeks it topped the latin pop albums chart , and reached number one on the mexican albums chart . [SEP] it is his fifth consecutive album to chart on the billboard 200 ( reaching number sixty @ - @ five ) , and his fourth album to chart in spain ( peaking at number sixty @ - @ eight ) . [SEP]
[CLS] within one week after its release independiente was certified gold in chile , the united states and mexico and certified platinum in venezuela and argentina . [SEP] five singles have been released from the album . [SEP]
[CLS] the lead single , " el amor " , became a commercial success in several latin american countries and was number one on the billboard latin songs and latin pop songs charts . [SEP] it was followed by " fuiste tu " ( featuring gaby moreno ) , which reached number one on the latin pop songs , number two on the latin songs charts and topped several other national charts . " [SEP]
[CLS] mi novia se me esta poniendo vieja " was released in may 2012 ; " te quiero " in july 2012 , and " si tu no existieras " in november 2012 . [SEP] to promote independiente , arjona embarked on his metamorfosis world tour . [SEP]
[CLS] in 2010 , arjona wanted to change his musical style ; after experimenting with using as few instruments as possible , he obtained a sound similar to an a capella performance ( simplifying his sound ) and introduced what he called a " stripped @ - @ down acoustic effort " to his music . [SEP] this was heard on his twelfth studio album , poquita ropa . [SEP]
[CLS] arjona produced the album with dan warner , who has worked with shakira , celine dion and christina aguilera . [SEP] when promoting the album arjona said , " [ songs ] are like women ; they get things up and are so concerned about this that they forget that the less clothes , more beauty . [SEP]
[CLS] the songs are often overwhelmed by ourselves , because we saturate them with arrangements looking to exalt their qualities and we end up hiding them " . [SEP] poquita ropa became the first album since adentro which arjona recorded without torres . [SEP]
[CLS] weeks before the release of independiente , arjona issued a letter raising the issue of his past relationships with recording companies . [SEP] he revealed the circumstances of his first contract : " a producer , friend of mine , told them [ the record label ] that if they did not sign me in , they won ' t sign two artists he had [ at that time ] " . [SEP]
[CLS] arjona further explained that he received the " minimum royalty percentage " from his most successful albums . [SEP] independiente is arjona ' s first independent release through his own label : metamorfosis , a company he created to refocus his career . [SEP]
[CLS] the company is presided by arjona and several friends ( including photographer @ - @ director ricardo calderon , universal music mexico executive humberto calderon and bmg ' s miriam sommerz ) , and is based in miami and mexico city . [SEP] arjona commented that his independence represented compromise more than freedom , stating that " inside the word ' independent ' , even when it sounds like extreme freedom , there ' s a big amount of compromise and the responsibility of being able to administrate , in the best way possible , such independence " . [SEP]
[CLS] billboard notes that , although other groups have released independent albums following contracts with major labels , arjona is the most important latin pop artist to do so . [SEP] although the album is marketed within the new label , distribution was handled by warner music . [SEP]
[CLS] independiente marked arjona ' s fourth collaboration with torres . [SEP] the latter was a composer and producer , also receiving background @ - @ vocal credit . [SEP]
[CLS] the musicians first worked together in 2005 , when arjona released his tenth studio album ( adentro ) . [SEP] he stated that he first " tested " torres by sending him the " hookiest and darkest tracks " on the album : " acompaname a estar solo " and " iluso " . [SEP]
[CLS] torres then " went all out on the first demo , hiring a full band that included a string orchestra " . [SEP] in quien dijo ayer ( 2007 ) , torres produced the singles " quien " and " quiero " and provided background vocals on the remastered versions of arjona ' s past hits . [SEP]
[CLS] in 5to piso ( 2008 ) , torres produced several tracks ; one was the lead single " como duele " , considered arjona ' s " biggest hit in years " by jason birchmeier of allmusic . [SEP] the album was composed over a one @ - @ year period . [SEP]
[CLS] most of its production was handled by three producers familiar with arjona ' s work : dan warner , lee levin and dan rudin . [SEP] tommy torres also produced three tracks : the lead single " el amor " , second single " fuiste tu " and " hay amores " . [SEP]
[CLS] victor patron produced two songs , ( " caudillo " and the piano version of " mi novia se me esta poniendo vieja " ) and julio chavez aided in the production of " reconciliacion " . [SEP] arjona wrote all the songs except " el amor " ( which was co @ - @ written with torres ) . [SEP]
[CLS] the album was recorded and produced in several cities in the united states and mexico . [SEP] independiente was mixed at the blue grotto in nashville , tennessee , and mastered by tom coyne and aya merrill at sterling sound in new york city . [SEP]
[CLS] with torres ' return to producing arjona regained the classic , trademark sound which torres helped develop since 2005 . [SEP] independiente opens with " lo que esta bien esta mal " , a latin pop song and the only track composed by dan warner instead of arjona ( who wrote the lyrics ) . " [SEP]
[CLS] el amor " was motivated by arjona ' s desire to examine " those big , dark events within love that nobody talks about " ; he continued , " [ the ] dark sides of love are extremely fundamental to understand its great value . " [SEP] arjona added , " so many good things abould love has been shown that somebody had to turn it around and tell the bad ones " . [SEP]
[CLS] in a february 2012 interview , arjona stated that " el amor " was the " most tawdry " song he had released to date , explaining that their choice of the song was a " contradiction " because it was not " the song which could better represent the entire album " . [SEP] he described it as " very strong " and " a bit dark " . [SEP]
[CLS] the single marked arjona ' s return to his signature , mainstream sound after the cuban music influenced poquita ropa ' s lead single " puente " , a mixture of salsa and merengue which failed to make an impact in the united states . [SEP] the album includes " fuiste tu " , a duet with guatemalan singer gaby moreno . [SEP]
[CLS] its instrumentation consists of piano , violin , guitars , drums and other percussion . [SEP] although arjona stated that he " had the possibilities to record this song with very well known people " he expressed his happiness with moreno , revealing that " the possibilities of doing it with her , for me , are a celebration " . [SEP]
[CLS] he described moreno as " incredibly talented " , a " countrywoman " and a " fantastic human being " . [SEP] arjona named " fuiste tu " as one of the most important songs on the album . " [SEP]
[CLS] mi novia se me esta poniendo vieja " took two years to complete and arjona dedicated it to his mother , noemi morales . [SEP] he stated that he wrote it " as a gift for my mom on mother ' s day " and that he thought " the idea of including it on the album was very good " . [SEP]
[CLS] as with his single " senora de las cuatro decadas " ( on 1994 ' s historias ) , at first he never thought to include the song on an album . " [SEP] caudillo " evokes " the image of some friends " arjona had at college ; he asserted that he " appears constantly there because sometimes we transform ourselves into a contradiction of all those things we fought in those moments . [SEP]
[CLS] it ' s the history of a student leader that becomes a president " . [SEP] arjona dedicated the album to his father , who died in 2011 . [SEP]

[CLS] the first single from independiente is " el amor " , released on 23 august 2011 . [SEP] in the united states it reached number one on the billboard top latin songs chart ( arjona ' s fourth number one on that chart , following " desnuda " , " cuando " and " el problema " ) and number one on the billboard latin pop songs chart . [CLS] independiente was nominated at the premios juventud of 2012 for the " lo toco todo ( i play it all ) " award . [SEP] on 25 september 2012 , the album received two nominations at the 13th annual latin grammy awards : album of the year and best singer @ - @ songwriter album . [SEP]

[CLS] the 2003 pacific typhoon season was a slightly below average yearlong period of tropical cyclogenesis exhibiting the development of 31 tropical depressions , of which 21 became named storms ; of those , 14 became typhoons . [SEP] though every month with the exception of february and march featured tropical activity , most storms developed from may through october . [SEP]
[CLS] during the season , tropical cyclones affected the philippines , japan , china , the korean peninsula , indochina , and various islands in the western pacific . [SEP] the season ran year @ - @ round , with the first storm , yanyan , developing west of the marshall islands on january 15 . [SEP]
[CLS] in april , typhoon kujira became one of the longest @ - @ lasting pacific typhoons in history and attained climatological records for its unusually early impacts . [SEP] typhoon imbudo in july caused several deaths and extensive damage across the philippines and china . [SEP]
[CLS] in september , typhoon maemi became one of the costliest typhoons in recorded history after striking south korea ; maemi was also the most intense tropical cyclone of the season with a minimum barometric pressure of 910 mbar ( hpa ; 26 @ . @ 87 inhg ) . [SEP] in late november , typhoon lupit devastated areas of yap state in the federated states of micronesia . [SEP]
[CLS] the season closed with the dissipation of a tropical depression east of the philippines on december 27 . [SEP] the scope of this article is limited to the pacific ocean , north of the equator and west of the international date line . [SEP]
[CLS] storms that form east of the date line and north of the equator are called hurricanes ; see 2003 pacific hurricane season . [SEP] tropical storms formed in the entire west pacific basin are assigned a name by the tokyo typhoon center . [SEP]
[CLS] tropical depressions in this basin monitored by the joint typhoon warning center ( jtwc ) have the " w " suffix added to their number . [SEP] tropical depressions that enter or form in the philippine area of responsibility are assigned a name by the philippine atmospheric , geophysical and astronomical services administration or pagasa . [SEP]
[CLS] this can often result in the same storm having two names . [SEP] on march 5 , 2003 , meteorologists from the university college london at the tropical storm risk ( tsr ) consortium issued an extended range forecast for the typhoon season , noting the likelihood of near average tropical cyclone activity as a result of projected neutral sea surface temperatures . [SEP]
[CLS] the forecast indicated the potential for 26 @ . @ 2 tropical storms , compared to the 10 – and 30 @ - @ year average of 27 @ . @ 8 and 26 @ . @ 3 storms , respectively . [SEP] the following month , the group raised their forecast for tropical storms to 26 @ . @ 7 , indicating a slightly above average season . [SEP]
[CLS] over next two months , however , fluctuations in sea surface temperatures , particularly those in the central pacific , caused the group to revise their predictions downward and indicated the probability for a slightly below average typhoon season in their june forecast . [SEP] a rise in sea surface temperatures in the following months prompted the forecasting group to once again raise their forecasts to indicate a near @ - @ average season in their final august forecast update , which predicted 27 tropical storms . [SEP]
[CLS] the group was very accurate in their forecasts , with their april and august forecasts being the most accurate . [SEP] similarly , meteorologists working with the city university of hong kong issued a seasonal projection on april 24 , 2003 , indicating the likelihood of a normal or below normal season with 29 total tropical cyclones , 26 tropical storms , and 16 typhoons . [SEP]
[CLS] as with the tsr , the group primarily based their forecast numbers on the prevailing status of the el nino @ - @ southern oscillation . [SEP] the city university of hong kong revised their forecasts on june 24 , 2003 , indicating a slight increase of total tropical cyclones to 30 . [SEP]
[CLS] the group was also accurate in their forecasts for the entirety of the northwest pacific , though their specialized forecasts for the south china sea were substantially off . [SEP] during the year , the japan meteorological agency ( jma ) issued advisories on tropical cyclones west of the international date line to the malay peninsula , and north of the equator ; this was due to the agency ' s status as the official regional specialized meteorological center , as designated by the world meteorological organization in 1989 . [SEP]
[CLS] the jma issued forecasts and analyses four times a day , beginning at 0000 utc and continuing every six hours . [SEP] the jma issued forecasts based on a climatological tropical cyclone forecast model . [SEP]
[CLS] the agency estimated 10 minute sustained winds and barometric pressure based on the dvorak technique and numerical weather prediction . [SEP] the jtwc also issued warnings on storms within the basin , operating from pearl harbor in hawaii to represent the interests of the united states armed forces in the indian and pacific oceans . [SEP]
[CLS] throughout the season , sea surface temperatures within the western equatorial pacific were above normal , including those in the south china sea . [SEP] areas of convection persisted year @ - @ round in the lower latitudes , particularly around the philippines . [SEP]
[CLS] atmospheric divergence was also prevalent in the same regions , resulting in enhanced tropical cyclogenesis east of the philippines in 2003 ; the mean region of development of tropical systems during the year was more southwest than the 1971 – 2000 30 @ - @ year average . [SEP] in 2003 , the jma monitored 21 tropical cyclones of at least tropical storm intensity ; of those , 14 reached typhoon intensity . [SEP]
[CLS] though the number of tropical storms was below average , the ratio between tropical storms and typhoons was 66 % greater than normal . [SEP] the philippine atmospheric , geophysical and astronomical services administration ( pagasa ) monitored three additional cyclones of at least tropical storm intensity that were not monitored by the jma . [SEP]
[CLS] the season began with the formation of tropical storm yanyan on january 15 . [SEP] after its dissipation five days later , no tropical cyclones of at least tropical storm intensity developed over the next two months . [SEP]
[CLS] this period of inactivity ended with the formation of typhoon kujira in mid @ - @ april ; kujira was one of the longest lived pacific storms on record and was the first typhoon with 1 @ - @ minute sustained winds of at least 240 km / h ( 150 mph ) in april since typhoon isa in 1997 . [SEP] tropical activity was enhanced from may to june , and during this period the jma monitored four tropical storms , while the pagasa monitored a fifth storm off the eastern philippines . [SEP]
[CLS] three of the four tropical storms monitored by the jma approached or hit japan , including typhoon soudelor , which brought heavy rainfall and wind across the ryukyu islands and the korean peninsula . [SEP] tropical activity once again declined towards the second half of june and first half of july . [SEP]
[CLS] the second half of july , however , featured the development of typhoons imbudo and koni , which both tracked westward across the philippines before striking areas near saipan and other regions of southeastern china . [SEP] imbudo caused the deaths of 78 people and us $ 383 million in damage . [SEP]
[CLS] august was a highly active month for tropical cyclogenesis , with a total of six tropical storms monitored by the jma , jtwc , and pagasa . [SEP] this included typhoons krovanh and dujuan , which also struck southeastern china . [SEP]
[CLS] typhoon etau earlier in the month made landfall in japan , resulting in 17 deaths . [SEP] activity was somewhat below average in september , with only one tropical cyclone making landfall , maemi . [SEP]
[CLS] however , maemi was the strongest tropical cyclone of the season and was the costliest with roughly us $ 4 @ . @ 8 billion in damage , mostly in south korea . [SEP] tropical cyclogenesis and activity continued to decline after august , with october featuring only three tropical storms . [SEP]
[CLS] however , two , ketsana and parma , reached typhoon intensity ; both stayed away from land . [SEP] november featured less storms but was climatologically average , with two typhoons developing . [SEP]
[CLS] the second typhoon , lupit , devastated portions of yap state , resulting in approximately $ 1 @ . @ 7 million in damage . [SEP] in december , the jtwc and pagasa monitored a sole tropical system east of the philippines , though the jma did not monitor or classify any tropical cyclones during the month . [SEP]
[CLS] in storm information below , wind @ - @ speed advisories differ from the joint typhoon warning center ( jtwc ) to the jma as the jtwc uses the united states criteria of 1 @ - @ minute mean to designate maximum sustained winds , while the jma uses the 10 @ - @ minute mean wind criteria to designate tropical cyclone maximum sustained winds . [SEP] this difference generally results in jtwc maximum winds appearing higher than the maximum winds described by the jma for the same cyclone . [SEP]
[CLS] on january 11 , the jtwc began monitoring the disturbance that would eventually develop into yanyan near the international date line . [SEP] as the system tracked westward , it gradually moved into a more favorable environment for tropical cyclogenesis . [SEP]
[CLS] on january 14 , surface observations indicated that the low @ - @ pressure area had developed a closed , low @ - @ level circulation center indicative of a tropical cyclone , satellite imagery remained inconclusive . [SEP] nonetheless , the jma classified the pressure area as a tropical depression west of the marshall islands at 0600 utc on january 15 . [SEP]
[CLS] the jtwc would follow suit by classifying the storm as such at 1800 utc later that day . [SEP] at the time , the depression was tracking west @ - @ northwest under the influence of a subtropical ridge to the north . [SEP]
[CLS] over the next day the system waned in convective activity before resuming its previous track and accelerating . [SEP] at 0000 utc on january 17 , the jtwc upgraded the system to tropical storm intensity , though the storm remained nameless as the jma continued to classify it as a tropical depression . [SEP]
[CLS] throughout january 17 the tropical storm would again oscillate in strength , resulting in a brief downgrade by the jtwc to tropical depression intensity . [SEP] however , an increase in deep convection resulted in its reclassification as a tropical storm at 1800 utc that day , followed by the jma upgrading the system to tropical storm intensity at 1200 utc on january 18 . [SEP]
[CLS] as such , the storm received the name yanyan . [SEP] at roughly the same time , the tropical cyclone began to stall east of the mariana islands and curve sharply northeastward . [SEP]
[CLS] whilst the jtwc indicated that yanyan peaked in strength late on january 18 with 1 @ - @ minute sustained winds of 60 km / h ( 37 mph ) , the jma considered the system to have maintained the same intensity throughout its stint as a tropical storm . [SEP] steered by the same nearby subtropical ridge , yanyan would continue to track towards the northeast into a less favorable tropical cyclone environment . [SEP]
[CLS] the jma downgraded yanyan to tropical depression at 1200 utc on january 20 before the storm transitioned into an extratropical cyclone as its low @ - @ level circulation center decoupled from the primary mass of convection due to strong wind shear . [SEP] at 0000 utc , both the jtwc and jma discontinued the monitoring of yanyan . [SEP]
[CLS] kujira developed from a broad area of disturbed weather as a tropical depression on april 9 well removed from any landmasses . [SEP] shortly after development , kujira quickly intensified in its early stages , and was upgraded to a tropical storm just two days after cyclogenesis . [SEP]
[CLS] strengthening slowed afterwards , though the storm attained typhoon intensity on april 14 . [SEP] intensification continued and late on april 15 , kujira reached its peak intensity with winds of 165 km / h ( 105 mph ) and a minimum barometric pressure of 930 mbar ( hpa ; 27 @ . @ 46 inhg ) . [SEP]
[CLS] following peak intensity , kujira would begin to track northwest and oscillate in strength , cresting an additional two times in intensity . [SEP] on april 21 , the typhoon was downgraded to tropical storm intensity and began to track erratically for several days east of taiwan . [SEP]
[CLS] however , on april 24 , kujira would resume a northward track and begin to weaken , and on april 24 was downgraded to tropical depression strength as it made landfall on kyushu . [SEP] following landfall , kujira transitioned into an extratropical cyclone on april 25 , which persisted until crossing the international dateline towards the end of april 2003 . [SEP]
[CLS] shortly after developing , kujira caused two fatalities in pohnpei in addition to minor agricultural and infrastructural damage ; similar effects were felt in guam . [SEP] several days later , the typhoon prompted cyclone warnings and other precautionary measures in the philippines after forecasts indicated the potential for strong winds and rain . [SEP]
[CLS] however , ultimately any effects in the archipelago associated with kujira remained minimal . [SEP] the typhoon also prompted warning products in taiwan , making it the first april typhoon since 1978 to cause such a feat . [SEP]
[CLS] unlike in the philippines , however , kujira would bring significant rainfall to taiwan . [SEP] effects from the typhoon were most significant in japan , particularly in the ryukyu islands . [SEP]
[CLS] strong winds , rain , and waves caused us $ 230 @ , @ 000 ( ¥ 27 @ . @ 8 million ) in agricultural damage on ishigaki island . [SEP] one person was killed due to injuries resulting from the waves . [SEP]
[CLS] in kyushu , heavy rainfall , peaking at 196 mm ( 7 @ . @ 7 in ) in oita prefecture , was reported . [SEP] overall , despite its distance away from land and weak intensity at the time of its sole landfall , kujira resulted in three fatalities . [SEP]
[CLS] midday on may 18 , the jtwc began to monitor an area of persistent disturbed weather associated with a broad low @ - @ pressure area southwest of chuuk . [SEP] within highly conductive conditions , the disturbance quickly organized and became classified as a tropical depression at 0000 utc the following day . [SEP]
[CLS] in its initial stages , the depression tracked slowly northeastwards . [SEP] however , a shortwave trough forced a weakness in a nearby ridge , allowing for the storm to take a more streamlined , northward path . [SEP]
[CLS] at 1200 utc on may 20 , the jma upgraded the depression to tropical storm chan @ - @ hom . [SEP] following the system ' s naming , chan @ - @ hom temporarily meandered towards the northwest before resuming its northeasterly track . [SEP]
[CLS] the next day , the storm began to develop an eye ; this was reflected with an upgrade by the jma to typhoon status at 0600 utc on may 23 . [SEP] gradual intensification followed , and at 1800 utc that day chan @ - @ hom reached its peak intensity with maximum sustained winds of 155 km / h ( 100 mph ) and a minimum pressure of 940 mbar ( hpa ; [SEP]

[CLS] at roughly the same time , the typhoon began to weaken and accelerate towards the northeast . [SEP] conditions continued to worsen as the storm moved further north , and as the cyclone passed east of minamitorishima , it was downgraded to tropical storm classification . [SEP]
[CLS] by this time , chan @ - @ hom had lost much of its convection due to wind shear . [SEP] early on may 27 , chan @ - @ hom had fully transitioned into an extratropical cyclone , and these remnants continued to track towards the northeast . [SEP]
[CLS] these extratropical remnants dissipated south of the aleutian islands the following day . [SEP] early in the typhoon ' s existence , chan @ - @ hom posed a potential threat to guam , but remained well east of the island . [SEP]
[CLS] however , after passing to the northeast , winds from the typhoon fanned volcanic ash from the recently erupting anatahan volcano towards the island , prompting precautionary measures in guam . [SEP] ashfalls were reported on the island , forcing the cancellation of several flights . [SEP]

[CLS] the erratic and slow movement of linfa off the western philippines was the catalyst for extreme rainfall and flooding , killing 41 persons in the archipelago . [SEP] precipitation peaked at 723 mm ( 28 @ . @ 5 in ) near dagupan . [SEP]

[CLS] the jtwc began to monitor the storm cluster on may 29 . [SEP] the following day , the jma reclassified the system as a tropical depression ; initially the system remained highly disorganized due to the lack of deep convection . [SEP]
[CLS] persistent moderate wind shear and dry air prevented the cyclone from strengthening significantly in the storm ' s early stages . [SEP] these conditions abated as the depression tracked northeast , and at 0000 utc on june 1 , the jma upgraded the system to tropical storm nangka . [SEP]
[CLS] throughout the course of the day , nangka continued to strengthen as it accelerated northeast , and peaked in strength with a barometric pressure of 985 mbar ( hpa ; [SEP] 29 @ . @ 09 inhg ) and maximum sustained winds of 95 km / h ( 60 mph ) , making it a severe tropical storm . [SEP]

[SEP] nangka continued to become increasingly disorganized as it moved further north , and late that day , the depression transitioned to an extratropical cyclone . [SEP]

[SEP] on june 11 , the shear decreased enough to allow the convection to organize , and the next day the jma classified it as a tropical depression northeast of palau . [SEP]

[SEP] soudelor moved to the northwest and later to the north , parallel to the eastern philippines , and on june 17 , the jma upgraded it to typhoon status . [SEP]

[CLS] morakot spawned from an area of disturbed weather in the philippine sea on july 31 . [SEP] tracking northwest , favorable conditions allowed for the intensification of the system to tropical storm strength on august 2 . [SEP]

[CLS] krovanh originated from a tropical disturbance within the monsoon trough east of chuuk state on august 13 . [SEP] despite rather favorable conditions , the initial tropical depression did not intensify significantly and degenerated into a remnant low on august 18 . [SEP]
[CLS] however , these remnants were able to reorganize and the system was reclassified as a tropical cyclone a day later . [SEP] intensification was rather rapid upon the storm ' s reformation – the depression reached tropical storm status on august 20 and then typhoon intensity two days later . [SEP]
[CLS] shortly after , krovanh made landfall on luzon at peak intensity with winds of 120 km / h ( 75 mph ) . [SEP] the typhoon emerged into the south china sea as a much weaker tropical storm , though it was able to restrengthen over warm waters . [SEP]
[CLS] once again at typhoon intensity , krovanh clipped hainan before moving over the leizhou peninsula on its way to a final landfall near cam pha , vietnam on august 25 . [SEP] quick weakening due to land interaction occurred as krovanh moved across northern vietnam , where the storm met its demise the following day . [SEP]
[CLS] krovanh first struck the philippines , resulting in heavy rainfall and displacing approximately 1 @ , @ 000 families . [SEP] the flooding caused severe damage and killed one person . [SEP]

[CLS] on august 27 , a tropical depression developed about 520 km ( 325 mi ) northwest of guam , which initially drifted to the southwest before turning to the northwest . [SEP] on august 29 , the jma upgraded it to tropical storm dujuan , and that day pagasa began issuing advisories on tropical storm onyok . [SEP]
[CLS] the storm quickly intensified into a typhoon , after developing an eye in the center . [SEP] on september 1 , the jma estimated dujuan attained peak 10 minute winds of 150 km / h ( 90 mph ) , and the jtwc assessed peak 1 – minute winds of 230 km / h ( 145 mph ) . [SEP]

[CLS] within the north @ - @ western pacific ocean , both the japan meteorological agency ( jma ) and the philippine atmospheric , geophysical and astronomical services administration assign names to tropical cyclones that develop in the western pacific , which can result in a tropical cyclone having two names . [SEP] the japan meteorological agency ' s rsmc tokyo — typhoon center assigns international names to tropical cyclones on behalf of the world meteorological organization ' s typhoon committee , should they be judged to have 10 @ - @ minute sustained windspeeds of 65 km / h , ( 40 mph ) . [CLS] while the philippine atmospheric , geophysical and astronomical services administration assigns names to tropical cyclones which move into or form as a tropical depression in their area of responsibility located between 135 ° e and 115 ° e and between 5 ° n @ - @ 25 ° n even if the cyclone has had an international name assigned to it . [SEP] the names of significant tropical cyclones are retired , by both pagasa and the typhoon committee . [SEP]
[CLS] should the list of names for the philippine region be exhausted then names will be taken from an auxiliary list of which the first ten are published each season . [SEP] unused names are marked in gray . [SEP]
[CLS] during the season 21 named tropical cyclones developed in the western pacific and were named by the japan meteorological agency , when it was determined that they had become tropical storms . [SEP] these names were contributed to a list of a 140 names submitted by the fourteen members nations and territories of the escap / wmo typhoon committee . [SEP]
[CLS] the philippine atmospheric , geophysical and astronomical services administration uses its own naming scheme for tropical cyclones in their area of responsibility . [SEP] pagasa assigns names to tropical depressions that form within their area of responsibility and any tropical cyclone that might move into their area of responsibility . [SEP]
[CLS] should the list of names for a given year prove to be insufficient , names are taken from an auxiliary list , the first 10 of which are published each year before the season starts . [SEP] the names not retired from this list will be used again in the 2007 season . [SEP]
[CLS] names that were not assigned are marked in gray . [SEP] the names imbudo and maemi were retired by the escap / wmo typhoon committee . [SEP]
